Documentation
Source editing The xml and xsl files contain all the information needed to display the website.
index.xml This is the main index file with all metadata for the website.
index.xsl This is the XSL stylesheet file with all the style information. In this file you can define the layout for your whole website.
*.xml Subpages are referenced from the index.xml. They don't necessarily need to have a .xml extension, but it's advisable for easy overview of your files.
